Sorry.. :)
You have to enter a name in the Patch, before applying it.
Then it will register the program to you :)
im entirely new to this. i downloaded MagicISO and i cant get it out of limewire to run it it says its running somewhere else when it isnt. any help would be greatly appreciated

If you don't know how to, these are the instructions:

1. Run setup.

2. Go to Program Files, drag n drop the patch file into the MagicIso Program File.

3. Go into the MagicIso Program File and run the patch.

4. Make it register to your name or whatever you want it registered to.

5. Click Crack.
